title: By Adverse Winds. [A novel.]
author: Smeaton, William Henry Oliphant.
snippet: As soon as he could escape from the dinner-table, Robert repaired to the stables, where he found his horse ready saddled for him, according to his instructions. Mounting, he rode rapidly out by the Comiston Eoad, Lothian Burn, and Hillend, to New Pentland. Need we ask why ? A concert was to be held that night in aid of some school-children's treat.
